mapper.select: select * from (select b.*, row_number() over(order by member_num desc) rnum from member_hotel b) where rnum >= #{startNo} and rnum <= #{endNo}
mapper.insert: insert into member_hotel values((select max(member_num) from member_hotel)+1, #{member_id}, #{member_nickname},#{member_name},#{member_pwd},#{member_addr},#{member_phone},sysdate)
mapper.update: update member_hotel set member_num = member_num - 1 where member_num > #{no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member_hotel where member_id like '%'||#{keyword} || '%'
